CROP_DISEASE: Inspect the affected leaves. Remove severely infected parts and apply a recommended fungicide. Contact local agri-extension for exact chemical and dosage.
FERTILIZER_SUGGESTION: Apply fertilizer as per soil test. For most crops, an NPK balanced dose helps. Consider urea for N and superphosphate for P.
IRRIGATION_GUIDE: Irrigate based on crop stage and soil moisture. Use drip irrigation where possible to save water.
WEATHER_QUERY: To get accurate weather, allow location access in the app. You can also use local IMD forecasts.
SOIL_HEALTH: Add organic compost, green manure and do a soil test. Correct pH with lime if acidic.
STORAGE_GUIDE: Store produce in a cool, dry, ventilated place. Use neem leaves or diatomaceous earth to reduce storage pests.
SEED_GUIDE: Use certified seeds from local suppliers. Choose varieties recommended for your district.
